attributes.action: 16 year old's shouldn't have to pay an adult fayre for the train until 18.
attributes.additional_details: I work 12 hours a week at the rate of £4.80 an hour which accumulates to £57.60. At the end of the week I would've spent £33 of that on train transport. - Summer
attributes.background: 16 year old's are not legible for the adults national living wage therefore why should students who are 16 pay a full adults price fayre, when 16 is still considered a child. why should we have to work a 10 hour shift and then have to immediately spend it on transport to school/college for 1 week.
